START
Level is
Make Friend

You are assigned to interview a killer who killed his father. You thought he is a perverted guy. But things turns out not quite the same as you think about. He is slient and honest. You are interested in him, and want to know what happened to him. So you keep in touch with him personally.

As a new journalist, you are introduced to one of the colleage. He is full of power on everything. You are talking happily with each other. You know that you can learn a lot from him. Just follow him, you will be able to became a super journalist.

You are assigned to follow a drug case. In the dedicated place, you only see one guy stand there. The time passed, but no one else coming. You thought that maybe the intelligence is not correct. You come to talk the only guy you see. He is very dignified. He thought you are a callboy. Ask your name, phone number and leave.

You are assigned to interview a new pop star. He just annource to become a actor last week. He is so cute and quite like a girl. Most time, he still not able to answer the question well. But that is also attact you. Personally you also ask to get in touch with each other.

You are assigned to interview the pop star who just win the second place for a charts. During the interview you know that he has win the first place for 5 years before. Now he is so sad about the result. You give him some encourage and comfort. And you invite him to have a drink together after the interview.
He is coming to purpuit curing the neat freak. He wears the glove all the time. And do not touch anything in the room. You are willing to be the physician in charge. You want to cure him very well.

In a doctor summit. You see someone who is much more slient than others. He did not say anything in the summit, and also not show any expression. You are curious what he is thinking about. So you went to talk with him. To your surprise, he talk to you much. And you leave the phone number and keep in touch.

A new graduated doctor join into your hospital. He is so charming and every nerse want to talk to him. He is assigned to follow with you. So you get more chance to come together with him. You find it is a good thing, because girls are followed you too because he is around you.

After you graudated from the university. You have long time not see the guy who are in the same community with you during the university. It is happened that you see each other in the street, and went to drink together because he is sad that day. You know that something happened to him. But you are not able to let him talk you the truth now. But you tell him to call you whenever he want someone to drink together.

He has the gunshot wounds. The men he owns are very nerious to ask for my help. You have the operation for him. And he has no risk now. You know he is hooligan. But it looks he is handsome and tender. You want to know more, so talk to him. And we know each other.
You are searching for a new bartender, and he comes. The excellent skill and handsome face attract you immediately. You hire him and he begins to work in your bar.

One night, two girls are contested a him. He is so optional. But no obvious like or not like. That attitude make you feel a little angry and a little interested. So you went to talk to him. And then you two become friends.

One day, a group of guys are drinking in your bar. He is so outstanding from them due to the beautiful face and special ethos. He drunk and keep talking something. Looks very funny. You keep him in the bar until he is sober up.

You are searching for someone to play the paino in your bar. He comes. He plays very well. And also he is able to help much more than playing paino. He know the account, the also can help on serving. You are quite happy that he can work in your bar.

He always drinks in your bar. He looks so cool. You sometimes to talk with him. You know that he owns a company, no girlfriends. But plenty of lovers. He never show his real heart. You do not like his character. But it is interesting you two become friends.

He is a legendary figure in the editor region. He is so powerful to save a almost dead publisher. You finally got a chance to talk with in a editor party. You successfully got this cell phone number. You will keep in touch.

A new editor is assigned to your team. He is the son of another publisher owner. I have no idea why such a heir need to come to your publisher. Anyway you find him working hard in a short time. You get along with him very well. Though he does not express himself most of the time. But you think he is a good guy.

He takes the latest interview to you. You are the editor for him. You have seen several interview from him. But this is the first time that you see him. He is full of power to the job. You are working get along with each other very well.
You know
You decide to change your career from
to
Change Career

steps.
